name: Christmas Combat
description:
A silly and fun snowball fps game. Local Multiplayer Deathmatch couldn't be more jankier.
Christmas Combat is a 2-4 player Local Multiplayer Deathmatch
game where you fight with snowballs.

Oh, all players are also different colored Santa's

Keyboard Controls:
-WASD to move
-Mouse to look around
-Left Mouse Click to shoot
-Space to jump
-M to mute music
-ESC or P to pause

Controller Controls:
-Left Analog Stick to move
-Right Analog Stick to look around
-Right Trigger to shoot
-A to jump (X on a DS, and B on a Switch Controller) 
-Start to pause.

-Christmas Tree: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/christmas-tree-e283aa7835664a74a4ad39afb26d2ef

-Gingerbread House: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/gingerbread-cottage-3december-7bb1c0a47e8e463493...

-The Music: https://void1gaming.itch.io/christmas-music-pack
